long_description: The Sugoi Piston 200 Tights for men feature compressive fabric to support your muscles while you're training in chilly weather. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying compression fabric slows muscle vibration, which conserves energy, reduces fatigue and increases circulation. Flat elastic drawstring waist offers a comfortable fit and wicks moisture; internal pocket stores a key or card. Closeout.
short_description: The Sugoi Piston 200 Tights for men feature compressive fabric to support your muscles while you're training in chilly weather.
